title: BEAUTIFUL, MODERN, BOUTIQUE, 1BR in PRIME BAY RIDGE AREA! NO FEES!!!
posting_body: ['BEAUTIFUL, MODERN, BOUTIQUE, 1BR in PRIME BAY RIDGE AREA!', 'NO FEES!!!', 'MODERN, BOUTIQUE, CLEAN, 1BR in PRIME BAY RIDGE AREA!', 'NO FEES!!!', 'NO FEES!!!', 'BEAUTIFULLY RENOVATED 1BR in PRIME BAY RIDGE AREA!', '*NEW Renovated Bedroom and Living Room', '*NEW Granite Counter tops and Cabinets', '*NEW Renovated Kitchen', '*NEW Stainless Steel Appliances', '*Solid Oak Hardwood floors', '*High Ceilings, 6 Foot Windows', '*Lots of Natural Light', '*Custom California Closet, Plenty of Storage Space', '*ALL Recently Renovated', '*Prime location in Bay Ridge', '*77th st R train station around the corner (STEPS AWAY)', '*Can furnish on request*!', 'Available August 15th', 'Rent includes heat and hot water', 'Surrounded by:', '*Great restaurants', '*Bakeries/cafe', '*laundromat on the same block', '*great bars', '*convenient stores', '*super markets', '*Starbucks', '*Boutique Shopping', '*Zagat rated #1 Restaurant in Bay Ridge & Michelin Guide Restaurant "Tanoreen" across the street!', 'CONTACT INFO:', 'James', '917.369.0184 (text)', '*NO FEES, NO BROKERS OR AGENTS*!']
